claim: Neurofeedback brain training has been proven to permanently heal the ADHD brain pattern.
sentence: neurofeedback brain training has been proven by exhaustive science two take that brain pattern with too much slow processing speed and teach it to make less of that slower processing speed and to make more of perfect processing speed that's a little bit faster so that your brain can focus can feel calm and relaxed can be maximally productive in the minimal amounts of time while feeling great
chunk: how can the ADHD brain pattern be healed permanently neurofeedback brain training has been proven by exhaustive science two take that brain pattern with too much slow processing speed and teach it to make less of that slower processing speed and to make more of perfect processing speed that's a little bit faster so that your brain can focus can feel calm and relaxed can be maximally productive in the minimal amounts of time while feeling great neurofeedback's able to take that brain pattern and heal it with little regression little chance of moving backwards the caveat is you have to do it right and you have to have a provider who knows what he or she is doing

claim: Exercise promotes the release of brain chemicals that are very good for you.
sentence: exercise promotes the release of brain chemicals that are very good for you
chunk: if three activities could help your anxiety improve your mental health and health in general would you be interested I will be discussing three natural remedies in this video the first item I want to discuss is exercise exercise promotes the release of brain chemicals that are very good for you dr. John Ratey describes exercise as a fertilizer to help our cells function optimally including brain cells exercise promotes neurogenesis which helps the brain grow new brain cells it helps you generate endorphins the body's feel-good chemicals which can help you feel a sense of well-being researchers at the Shante University Medicine who completed an experiment with panic attack sufferers concluded the following our results for the first time suggest that exercise has acute anti panic attack activity best of all you can get started today with something as simple as walking another natural remedy is proper eating dr. Daniel Amen explains that by optimizing the functioning of the basal ganglia things such as fear and anxiety can be decreased while at the same time things such as motivation and energy levels can be increased you can optimize by keeping your blood sugar levels consistent throughout the day in three ways by consuming one foods lower in carbohydrates than the typical Western diet two foods lower in glycemic love this term refers to how quickly a typical portion of a particular food raises your blood sugar you can easily find the glycemic rating of different foods by completing an internet search and then building a diet that favors this approach and finally for consuming food more frequently throughout the day but in lesser quantities another important item is proper sleep the division of sleep medicine at Harvard Medical School indicated studies have shown that even partial sleep deprivation has a significant effect on mood lack of sleep can't elevate the body's production of stress hormones which can affect mood and even cause depression however addressing these sleep problems makes a difference and even if you don't have underlying sleep problems taking the following steps can ensure you obtain adequate sleep and lead to improved mood and well-being ensure you don't have too much noise in your room where you sleep if noise is an unavoidable problem consider getting a white noise machine or a small fan that runs in the background ensure that your room is not too hot a cool temperature is best for sleeping if you wake in the night don't turn on the lights rather use a flashlight this is because light affects a brain chemical called melatonin which regulates your sleep-wake cycle would you like more information on the topics covered in this video all you need to do is simply click on the card on the upper right corner of this video and subscribe to our free newsletter thank you for watching as usual we look forward to presenting a new video in our series next week you

chunk: as the power struggle continues in Venezuela cancer patients are having to turn to alternative treatments as more medicines are becoming unavailable or just way too expensive one breast cancer patient is now relying on a homemade herbal treatment she speaks exclusively with our local tens Cody Waddell in Venezuela's Western portal gaycist a 34 year old naughties vie sky dad goes about her daily routine but she knows that her routine should also include a daily pill hormone treatment to lower the chances of her breast cancer returning I've been told to take these pills but they have to be bought in Colombia and I can't afford it and I don't have anybody to bring it here earlier this year biscaia undergoing surgery to remove the early stage cancer now she just needs those daily medications this has been very depressing my biggest fear is that this gets worse even though we caught it early filling helpless without the medicine she needs this guide at turning instead to herbal medicine the calabash tree shown to have anti-inflammatory properties she creates a paste boiling the fruit along with the pineapple land another plant she grows in her backyard I do have faith in natural remedies she says and I'm taking this as I've been instructed she would however prefer to take this concoction only as a supplement to her prescribed medication but for many suffering medical problems in Venezuela these herbal treatments now the only treatment available and so this story underscores the fact that while some humanitarian aid has arrived in Venezuela it's not expected to be nearly enough the United Nations estimates that roughly a third of Venezuelans are in urgent need of some type of assistance reporting from Bogota Kodi white a local 10 News

claim: Warts are caused by various strains of HPV that infect the outer layer of the skin resulting in Rapid cell growth.
sentence: Warts are caused by various strains of HPV that infect the outer layer of the skin resulting in Rapid cell growth.
chunk: warts are small benign skin growths that can occur anywhere on the body often appearing on the hands feet and face they are caused by the human papilloma virus HPV and can be unsightly and bothersome while warts are generally harmless many individuals seek ways to remove them due to cosmetic concerns in this video we will explore the causes of warts and provide a natural remedy utilizing baking soda castor oil and toothpaste to help you bid farewell to these pesky skin blemishes warts are caused by various strains of HPV that infect the outer layer of the skin resulting in Rapid cell growth the virus can enter the body through small Cuts or abrasions making it more likely to develop warts in those areas factors that contribute to the development of warts include weakened immunity frequent skin contact and public places like swimming pools or showers where the virus thrives while there are several Medical Treatments available for wart removal they can be costly and invasive many individuals prefer natural remedies that are gentle affordable and can be easily done at home here is a simple yet effective recipe to remove warts naturally ingredients 1 tablespoon baking soda one teaspoon castor oil 1 teaspoon toothpaste preferably one containing baking soda enjoying the video then give it a like and share it with your friends you can also contribute to the channel through the thanks button don't forget to subscribe to be notified of any new videos instructions Begin by thoroughly cleansing the affected area with mild soap and warm water Pat the skin dry gently in a small bowl combine the baking soda castor oil and toothpaste mix well to form a smooth paste apply the paste directly onto the wart ensuring complete coverage use a cotton swab or clean finger for precise application once applied cover the wart with a bandage or medical tape to keep the paste in place leave the mixture on the wart overnight or for a minimum of six to eight hours in the morning remove the bandage and rinse the area with warm water gently exfoliate the treated area with a pumice stone or an emery board to remove any dead skin cells baking soda castor oil and toothpaste all possess properties that Aid in wart removal baking soda acts as an exfoliant helping to remove dead skin cells and gradually eliminate the wart its alkaline nature also creates an unfavorable environment for the virus hindering its growth castor oil possesses antimicrobial properties and is believed to stimulate the immune system assisting in the elimination of the virus toothpaste containing baking soda adds an extra exfoliating effect helping to Slough off the wart over time precautions and additional tips prior to applying any home remedy it is advisable to do a patch test on a small area of healthy skin to ensure you don't have an adverse reaction it's important to keep the affected area clean and dry to prevent the spread of the virus and promote healing if the wart persists or shows sign of infection it is recommended to consult a health care professional avoid picking scratching or biting warts as this can increase the risk of spreading the virus to other parts of the body or to other people remember to exercise patience and consistency when using natural solutions as results May Vary from person to person if warts persist or worsen it's always the use of mathematical and computational techniques to understand and propose solutions to human problems my current research interest encompasses the development and analysis of mathematical models to solve problems of public health concern with a focused on emerging and re-emerging infectious diseases such as malaria leishmaniasis ebola epithet is among others I am currently working on combination therapy high patatas B virus infection with positive synergy between two existing drugs namely interferon alpha and alpha via if a tactic B virus infection is one of the most prevalent infectious diseases associated with liver disorder and can result in serious liver failure fibrosis and liver cancer despite the availability of apparatus B virus infection vaccine and the development of antiviral it interval all therapies if a tactus B virus infection remains a major global health problem it affects 5% of the world population chronically and kills roughly 600,000 people our knowledge several animal models have been developed to understand the virus biology and pathogenesis in infected patients and to mimic the immune response against the hepatitis B virus infection however the narrow host range of hepatitis B virus infection and lack of a full immune response spectrum in animal models remain significant limitations the drugs interferon alpha and a dacovia can have severe side effects when administered alone including heart attack for interferon alpha and kidney damage for one phobia in this work we hypothesize that a combination therapy with the smaller dose may be as effective or even more effective than mono therapy with the larger dose the results of this study will be useful to medical and pharmaceutical corporations in setting treatment strategies for hepatitis B virus infection the treatment could be customized to the patient's current immune response strength moreover the severe side effect that we're all dependent will be diminished since each drug will be administered at smaller dose for more information about postdoctural fellowships at the national institute for mathematical and biological synthesis visit our Home remedies for pimples were shared by many people already… but there’s a lot more difference between… the remedies shared by people having clear skin and... ...the remedies shared by people having pimples like me Because I personally gone through a lot, because of pimples I know how much pimples can damage your self confidence So the home remedy now I’m gonna tell is… personally tried by me to cure my own pimples &amp; it’s a best home remedy And trust me, this home remedy gives wonderful results... ...to the people who have tried already &amp; they told me personally So without wasting time, let’s move into the video And let’s see what that home remedy is You need 3 ingredients for this home remedy Aloevera Gel Honey Turmeric Powder (Wild Turmeric) Only these 3 ingredients are enough Use naturally extracted aloe vera gel, if you have it in your home Or else use the aloe vera gel And I bought this aloe vera gel from instagram its a homemade brand with good quality If you need this aloe vera gel, I’ll give link below in the description &amp; check it First I’m adding aloe vera gel Add 1tsp of aloe vera gel Take ¾ tsp of wild turmeric And take 1 tsp of honey Mix all the 3 ingredients well Turmeric have anti bacterial, anti inflammatory &amp; anti septic properties And above all, turmeric is rich in Vitamin-C, which helps in effective skin brightening And honey also has anti inflammatory, anti septic &amp; anti bacterial properties In addition to that, honey gives good glow to your face And aloe vera gel has anti bacterial, anti septic, anti inflammatory &amp; anti viral properties And aloe vera gel is rich in vitamins such as Vitamin – A, C &amp; E And this aloe vera gel is very good As all the 3 ingredients have anti bacterial properties, it’ll kill the bacteria of the pimples And it’ll control the pimples well So mix it will until you get this consistency This is the correct consistency So now I’m gonna apply this home remedy in my face, where I’ve pimples Like this you’ve to apply the remedy for 30mins daily &amp; wash it with normal water or facewash If you apply this on your pimples for 3 days continuously, it’ll remove the pimples, in spite how much big &amp; how harsh the pimple is Definitely it’ll give best results &amp; I’ll promise you Before this, I’ve applied this remedy continuously for 3 days &amp; shown the results In day 1, my pimple is big in size And after applying In day 2 those active pimples got shrink, became inactive  &amp; results in undevelopment stage In day-3 there are no traces for the pimples existed &amp; it got cured completely And I’m recommending this remedy, as I’ve already tried &amp; got good results This home remedy can be tried by both boys &amp; girls as there is no problem But if boys fear about hair fall (as turmeric is used), don’t apply on the beard region Apply in other areas of your face I hope this home remedy for pimples is useful for everyone Please give it a try &amp; don’t just ignore after seeing this video Please do try at your home And I’ll guarantee you that, it’ll give good results As lot of people are already got benefit with good results, I promise And alove vera gel I used is from Deyga brand, bought it from instagram Seriously, it’s a nice aloe vera gel And I’ve finalized this gel, after trying other gels out there Because it doesn’t have any added colors or fragrances &amp; claim: Drinking more than two liters of water for six months did not improve the speaker's skin.
sentence: i actually tried drinking more than two liters for six months and now the only thing that changed was the frequency that i went to toilet
chunk: if drinking more water exercising more sleeping more reducing stress or generally the tips that people give you on youtube didn't work for you then this video is for you hi guys it's me julie today i'm back with another very requested video just because i'm asian and have a clear skin a lot of people think that my clear skin is something genetic i struggled with acne over eight years i'm currently 20 now and i got my first acne when i was 12. ever since then i struggled so freaking much with acne and now after eight years finally i cleared my skin as you can see my skin is glowing i mean i hope so today i'll split this video into four parts we'll be talking about my acne background what did work what didn't work and how i did clear my skin everything will be time stamped down in description below so check it out and don't lose time so let's get started firstly let's talk about my acne background and let's talk about the acne type that i had and the acne type that i had according to my dermatologist was something hormonal plus caused by stressed if you don't know i'm a medical student and from my childhood i always wanted to become a doctor in my middle school i was visiting private middle school i had 50 to 75 percent off scholarship because i had so good grades and in high school i went to my dream high school which is one of the best high schools in turkey i'm not saying these to brag about my grades whatever but i from my childhood i was always stressed to get good grades i was stressing myself so freaking much because i had so high expectations for myself and i was always making myself stressed so it of course affected my skin as you can see my skin was so so freaking bad and i tried so so so many things to cure this acne that we are about to talk about if you ever searched on youtube about how to get clear skin you'll probably hear from youtubers who have a glass skin they always say drink more water exercise more change your diet etc so let's talk about those drinking more water i actually tried drinking more than two liters for six months and now the only thing that changed was the frequency that i went to toilet and the second one is changing diet i tried eating super healthy i went even vegetarian i also went vegan but those things didn't clear my skin as well third one exercising more i was exercising 30 to 6 minutes five times a week approximately doing cardio doing weight lifting and stretching yoga and a bunch of stuff however it didn't clear my skin as well i tried going to bed every single day at 9 00 pm for six months or so and i was waking up around 5 5 5 30 am ish i tried that as well but it didn't clear my skin as well after trying these fancy stuff out there i said okay there was something wrong with me i visited several dermatologists and i used their medication i use their creams i use the stuff that they give to me but nothing worked like literally nothing worked for me i couldn't find a dermatologist who was caring actually about my acne not the amount of the money i paid to them i just said okay dermatologists are not caring about my acne the only thing that take care is my money i stopped visiting my dermatologist and that day i become a skincare i tried every single product that you can ever imagine on market and not only in western market but also in the asian skin care market i found a lot of good products that worked for my skin but those effects were not long term all of the effects that i had was very short term and my acne came back every time my period came one day when i was scrolling through youtube i sold a video from a japanese dermatologist tamori arata who is one of my favorite youtuber slash dermatologists out there she was telling in one of her videos that skincare is something supplementary and you cannot cure your skin problems with your skin care if you have acne you cannot completely clear it with skin care you have to go to a dermatologist and whatever they prescribe to you okay so now let's talk about how i cleared my skin is i found a super super nice dermatologist and i went to his clinic and then he looked into my skin and i talked about my acne background we decided to start a medication called accutane or isotretinoin as some people call or accutane accutane is a serious drug prescribed by dermatologists you shouldn't be using accutane if your dermatologist didn't prescribe to you you shouldn't you shouldn't because it's a very very very serious drug accutane is intense here i'll put the side effects of the accutane however let me read some of the scary side effects of the actin depression headaches hair loss neurological symptoms vision problems nosebleed rapid breakdown of muscle tissue blood disease and a lot of lot of scary side effects it's very scary drug and it's pretty intense but my dermatologist said you tried everything but nothing worked for you so this is the last solution that you can use and let us try and here is my accutane journey accutane

claim: Activated charcoal is an effective anti-acne remedy. It has detoxifying property which really purifies the blood. Its incredible exfoliating property it clears the clogged pore and deeply cleanses the skin. It makes the appearance of dark spot less visible.
sentence: activated charcoal is an effective anti acne remedy it has detoxifying property which really purifies the blood its incredible exfoliating property it clears the clogged pore and deeply cleanses the skin it makes the appearance of dark spot less visible
chunk: namaskar acne is a skin condition that affects lots of youngsters and teenagers these days acne can be treated with a simple lifestyle modification such as avoiding oily and processed food staying active and maintaining hygiene however we frequently neglect these essential activities and indulge in those that contributes to acne such as eating junk food every other day staying inactive all day or forgetting to set aside time for self-care self-care is important if you want to have a clear skin free from acne acne is a skin ailment that occurs when oil and dead skin cells clog hair follicles inflamed blackheads pus-filled pimples or red sensitive bumps all are symptoms of acne today i am going to share three top face pack for acne these packs have the most natural ingredients that will instantly work on acne and help you get clear and glowing skin first one activated charcoal face pack the ingredients that you would need are 1 teaspoon activated charcoal powder 1 teaspoon aloe vera gel 1 drop of tea tree oil now understand the method in a small bowl combine all the ingredients and mix them together before applying them on the skin massage this charcoal pack on the face in a clockwise direction have a circular motion for one minute let the pack dry for 10 to 15 minutes and then rinse with warm water activated charcoal is an effective anti acne remedy it has detoxifying property which really purifies the blood its incredible exfoliating property it clears the clogged pore and deeply cleanses the skin it makes the appearance of dark spot less visible aloe vera gel has astringent property that pulls dirt and excess oil out of the skin which helps preventing breakout it contains antibacterial quality that helps to control and reduce the production of bacteria which causes acne aloe vera gel is also used to moisturize your skin and so it will really nourish your skin tea tree oil is a wonderful skin treatment option specially for oily and acne prone skin tea tree oil is a popular choice for treating acne because of its anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial property it instantly calms redness swelling and inflammation second rice flour face pack the ingredients are 2 tsp rice flour 1 teaspoon lemon juice and 1 teaspoon honey so here in a small bowl mix all these three ingredients and form a paste now apply an even layer on your face and neck of this paste apply paste in a circular motion and let it dry for 10 to 15 minutes gently wash your face with water and dry your face with soft topping rice flour is an excellent ingredient to get rid of acne and pigmentation spot it has skin brightening and the tan property and can help to reveal your inner skin glow it's an excellent source of vitamin b which helps in the production of new cells and makes your skin look young and fresh lemon juice is loaded with citric acid that directly targets the clay prone areas and dries out the excessive oil its antiseptic property kills bacterias that causes acne it is loaded with vitamin c and lightens the acne mark slowly slowly raw honey helps to balance the bacterias on the skin making it an excellent acne treatment honey also improves the healing of the skin cell and it is also a great moisturizer which can keep your skin soft throughout the day third orange peel face pack one teaspoon orange peel powder and two teaspoon rose water add both these ingredients and make a fine paste apply this paste all over your face and neck let it dry for 15 to 20 minutes and then wash it out with warm water tap dry your face later orange peel powder can be made very easily in the house the peel of orange could be put in sun let it dry and then make a powder of it it is very simple but this would be wonderful if you do it at home as orange peel powder is high in vitamin c which helps in the formation of collagen and elastin in all skin type especially in oily skin because orange peel has antibacterial quality they fight acne causing germs which would result in clear skin rose water has antiseptic and anti-microbial property which helps to reduce symptoms of acne breakouts rose water has a mild ps level of 5.5 which helps to gently cleanse the skin without harming it it removes oil and dirt from your skin by unclogging your pores so here are the three best face pack for acne prone skin apply this face pack and see the difference on your skin your skin will not only be acne free it will also get back its real glow apart from all these beneficial packs you should also practice some asanas that helps to enhance blood circulation on the face legion and this would prevent acne breakouts you can practice yoga the chakrasan prikunasana sarvangasana yoga mudra and hast padasa remember to maintain a healthy and active lifestyle this would help to detox all the toxins from your body and helped to see that your skin comes back to its original natural glow skin would be clear glowing and you would just enjoy yourself so take care namaskar

claim: Acne occurs when the pores of your skin become cloaked with dead skin bacteria and oil.
sentence: acne occurs when the pores of your skin become cloaked with dead skin bacteria and oil
chunk: acne occurs when the pores of your skin become cloaked with dead skin bacteria and oil acne can be distressing and is common in young people aged 11 to 30 acne typically develops on the face back and chest and can cause spots oily skin and skin that is painful to touch although acne is common it's can vary in type and severity depending on how severe acne is there is a range of treatments available to care for acne prone skin although symptoms will usually fade over time without acne treatment there are many steps you can take to help treat the condition there are topical treatments such as pointment and creams that can be prescribed to you if you're suffering from severe acne some typical treatments include retinoids benzoyl peroxide and azelaic acid all treatments such as antibiotics can be prescribed by your GP and can be taken in combination with a topical treatment a natural remedy for acne prone skin is apple cider vinegar apple cider vinegar contains lactic acid which helps reduce inflammatory lesions make sure to use it in small amounts of diluted water green tea has anti-inflammatory properties and is rich in cartridges which are antimicrobial and helped destroy acne causing bacteria as a natural remedy you can apply green tea directly to the skin tea tree oil is another great natural remedy you can incorporate into your skincare routine after you've washed your face with a gentle cleanser for acne prone skin dispense a few drops of tea tree oil onto a damp cotton swab and dot it directly onto blemishes make sure to avoid excessive washing washing affected areas more than twice a day can irritate skin and aggravate symptoms if you enjoyed this video make sure to like it and share it with your friends and check out our other videos to learn more about acne dr. ferran tallada has written an in-depth guide on medics along with Emma Coleman you can find the link and the full guide in the description below

claim: Acne generally occurs when the open pores of your skin are clogged with dirt, oil and bacteria.
sentence: Acne generally occurs when the open pores of your skin are clogged with dirt, oil and bacteria.
chunk: Acne is the villain of our flawless complexion especially when it pops up on important days. So in this video, we’re going to talk about the causes of acne, foods that you can avoid and some natural remedies to treat it. Acne generally occurs when the open pores of your skin are clogged with dirt, oil and bacteria. If you do not wash your face after a long day, especially if you have an oily skin type, you’re going to end up clogging your pores resulting in breakouts. So it’s really important to cleanse your face 2-3 times a day to prevent excess oil production and acne. Over exfoliation of the skin may also put skin’s oil production into overdrive. Scrub your face once or twice a week to keep your skin healthy and radiant. When the bacteria on the surface of the phone comes in contact with our skin, this aggravates the skin leading to acne and breakouts. So clean your screens whenever you get the chance. It’s time to look at what you’re putting inside your body that’s causing the flare up. The worst offenders are sugar, caffeine, refined carbohydrates. Avoid going overboard with fried and processed baked foods that are enemies of the body as well as your skin. Sometimes people who consume a lot of dairy in terms of milk, ice creams, etc also suffer from acne. Chocolates are known to reactivate acne causing bacteria in the body. Eat plenty of skin and heart friendly nuts and seeds that are high in omega 3 fatty acids and zinc. Foods that are high in antioxidants, vitamins A and E and zinc also fall in the anti-acne foods category. The best way to treat recurring acne is to go all natural. So get your fix right here. This decadent mask will not only make your skin glow but also exfoliate and eliminate acne. Mix 2 tsp of fine coffee, 1 tbsp cocoa powder, ½ tsp cinnamon powder and 1 tsp honey. The antioxidants and stimulants present in coffee reduce skin inflammation and unclog pores. Cocoa powder detoxifies the skin, cinnamon fights acne. Honey on the other hand has antibacterial and anti-fungal properties. Add some water or rose water to the mix and apply on your face. This mask revives and brightens dull skin in no time. If your skin is producing excess oils and you’re fearing a massive acne eruption on your face, give this DIY a try. You want to start by taking 2 tsp of besan, 1 teaspoon multani mitti and 3 tbsp rose water. Mix them and apply. Leave it on for 20 minutes and then rinse. Apple cider vinegar is one of the favourite astringents out there as it balances out skin’s pH levels making your skin less oily and less dry. Mix 1 part of ACV and 4 parts of water and use a spritzer or wipe it over your face using a cotton pad. Now that you know everything about how to deal with acne, it’s time to put this information to good use. Until next time, stay tuned and stay Glamrs.

chunk: Acne is the villain of our flawless complexion especially when it pops up on important days. So in this video, we’re going to talk about the causes of acne, foods that you can avoid and some natural remedies to treat it. Acne generally occurs when the open pores of your skin are clogged with dirt, oil and bacteria. If you do not wash your face after a long day, especially if you have an oily skin type, you’re going to end up clogging your pores resulting in breakouts. So it’s really important to cleanse your face 2-3 times a day to prevent excess oil production and acne. Over exfoliation of the skin may also put skin’s oil production into overdrive. Scrub your face once or twice a week to keep your skin healthy and radiant. When the bacteria on the surface of the phone comes in contact with our skin, this aggravates the skin leading to acne and breakouts. So clean your screens whenever you get the chance. It’s time to look at what you’re putting inside your body that’s causing the flare up. The worst offenders are sugar, caffeine, refined carbohydrates. bell icon to be notified when more videos come out the first point to reduce the frequency size and distribution of acne is lung one lung one is known as the great letting go point signifying that this point stimulates a healthy release of toxins waste and nervous system tension long one is located in the groove between your shoulder joint and your chest right over here to find lung one on your left side put your finger in the spot that is in the groove between your chest and your shoulder and just below the collarbone right about here now find a point that is about the width of one thumb below that [Music] press in to find a spot that is sensitive sore tender or painful that is lung one activate lung one by rubbing the area quickly five times take a break for a count of five and repeat four more times it might look like this or if you have a tashin it might look like this now find and activate lung one on your right side after activating long one take a few deep breaths [Music] feel fresh air coming in and tension going out the next point used to reduce the frequency severity and spread of acne is large intestine 4. large intestine 4 is known as joining valley which gives a clue to its location on the back of your hand in addition to helping relieve acne large intestine 4 is said to sharpen inactivate the senses of vision smell sound taste and touch large intestine 4 is like a pharmacy in your hand and has been used to relieve pain and stiffness in the hands address insufficient or excess sweating and relieve inflammation in the hands arms chest head intestine 4 look at the back of your left hand notice the fold of skin that's between your thumb and your hand right over here press into the tip of that fold and find a spot that is sensitive sore [Music] or if you have a taste shin it might look like this [Music] now locate large intestine 4 on your right side and repeat after activating large intestine 4 take a few deep breaths and take a herbal medicine the name of the formula often describes its most pronounced effect free and easy wanderer refers to how a 10 year old child feels on a sunny day without a care in the world free and easy wander has been used for centuries to promote an overall feeling of well-being help balance hormones support alertness and mental clarity i put a link below for more information about free and easy wandra the third point for relieving acne is called the intane yin tang is known as the hall of impressions yin tang is one of the most powerful acupuncture points for reducing nervous system overload in addition to relieving acne yin tang is used to relieve stress anxiety eye strain and sinus issues it is believed the intang exerts a powerful influence to reduce nervous system overload yin tang has been used to reduce all types of pain and improve upper body strength it's a great point to use before exercise yin tang is located between the inner ends of your eyebrows right over here activate yin tang by rubbing it five times quickly take a break for a count of five and repeat four more times it might look like this or if you have a tai shin it might look like this [Music] after activating yin tang you may feel heat or energy in your eyes ears face or head this is normal and therapeutic if you have acne and you're tired of looking at it i suggest that you activate lung one the great letting go point large intestine 4 joining valley

claim: Apple cider vinegar contains none of the vitamins a B6 c e or K and no nasin riboflavin thamin penic acid or folate.
sentence: according to the USDA apple cider vinegar contains none of the vitamins a B6 c e or K and no nasin riboflavin thamin penic acid or folate
chunk: okay Down the Hatch oh I hope this [Music] works hey there Health nuts and internet crazers Trace here for D news there are broad claims regarding the efficacy of apple cider vinegar power to curb appetite burn fat cure rashes stop heartburn bring down fever and cure asthma treat wounds reduce effects of aging and even cure diseases like cancer is this a miracal drug no it's not but that doesn't mean it's bunk vinegar is a derivative of alcoholic beverages to make their bottled Delights wine makers ferment grapes with yeast the yeast eat sugar from the grapes and poop out alcohol and CO2 yum to make vinegar is the same but acetab actor bacteria is added to Wine the bacteria eats the alcohol and then poops out acetic acid acetic acid is what makes vinegar vinegar the word vinegar comes from French for sour wine although it can be made from wine beer rice or other fermentables like wood apple cider vinegar is made with you guessed it double fermented apple cider apples to Hard Cider to apple cider vinegar personal note why'd y'all mess up a good thing according to the USDA apple cider vinegar contains none of the vitamins a B6 c e or K and no nasin riboflavin thamin penic acid or folate what it does contain according to the FDA is a minimum of 4% of acetic acid and a lot of water this means vinegar or acetic acid likely won't make you thinner and there is no scientific support of it as a skin toner and when Medscape general medicine conducted a review of all the research on vinegar they found that it was not recommended as an anti-infectious medicine orally or topically more like on your surface and probably doesn't fight hypertension and in terms of its cancer fighting claims while it did shrink leukemia cells and tumors in lab experiments that effect has not been shown in humans at all now a 2015 study in plus one did find small concentrations of acetic acid can help reduce bacterial growth on surfaces and Pub cam lists acetic acid as having mild antibacterial and antifungal properties this is why vinegar can be used as a mild household cleanser but putting vinegar on your face is probably not the best idea pimples are bacterial infections of the cious gland so it might decrease bacterial load there however it's not recommended by any real scientific research though I did find a 1916 book for nurses that recommended vinegar as a treat for acne but it also advised putting Mercury on your face drinking vinegar was studied way more often than using it as an antibacterial Aid acids are known boosters of mineral absorption so a tiny bit of vinegar on a green leafy salad can help our digestive systems absorb more calcium from the leaves than we would naturally and a 2004 study of 11 people with type 2 diabetes found when participants consumed a tiny bit of vinegar they had higher sensitivity to insulin which is a good thing and though this study was too small to generalize to All Humans research is ongoing and it is really positive the thing is don't drink too much vinegar vinegar is an acid and will damage the throat and stomach lining and also erode the teeth there is a reason it is diluted and speaking of diluted if you leave vinegar alone that same bacteria that fermented the alcohol to turn it into vinegar will eventually grow into a massive colony which some call a mother yeah aactor bacteria grows into kombucha eventually so there you go crunchy greeny Birkenstock wearers go be friends but if you're interested in drinking the pre-made apple cider vinegar derivative kombucha maybe you should learn more about what that is first in this video Kombucha tea has been popular with holistic health proponents for decades likely branching from centuries old Asian medicine if you've never seen it before modern Kombucha Tea comes from a strange looking container of brownish liquid with a blob floating in it have you tried apple cider vinegar are you against it are you for it tell us in the comments or come find me over on Twitter I'm @ Trace Dominguez make sure you subscribe see you next time on D [Music] news

claim: Poor gut health raises the risk of estrogen-related disorders such as PCOS, endometriosis, and breast cancer.
sentence: studies also show that poor gut health raises the risk of estrogen-related disorders such as pcos endometriosis and breast cancer
chunk: are you suffering from bloating fatigue irritability hair loss mood swings anxiety or depression headaches acne or irregular periods or have you noticed that now or lately you're more forgetful or did you put on some extra pounds without eating extra food and now you're having a hard time getting rid of the extra weight here's one do you find yourself having more sugar cravings but you can't turn away from the sugar if you can relate to any of the symptoms that i just mentioned it could be that your hormones are out of balance we all know that we have hormones but do we know what they do for our bodies today i will share some facts about your hormones and then show you how to make a delicious healthy juice to help your hormones get back on track [Music] hormones help your cells to communicate and take action in addition they support your body's endocrine system which governs growth and development reproduction metabolism temperature and even your mood the endocrine system and hormones keep your body in a state of homeostasis which is a state of balance and because of this having too little or too much of a certain hormone a hormone imbalance can cause health issues now one of the main factors that can cause a hormonal imbalance is the condition of your gut when gut health isn't optimal hormones become imbalanced so to fix your hormones we need to fix your gut your gut plays a major role in your health your immune system your brain your hormones and your mental health your gut contains trillions of microscopic organisms known as the microbiome and this microbiome is a community of microorganisms that live in your gut digestive tract and on your skin within your digestive tract you have different strands of bacteria yeast and fungi that all coexisted they all have a job to do that benefits your health and your well-being growing evidence and studies show that the bacteria that live in your gut affect your hormones research shows that the microbiota regulates estrogen studies also show that poor gut health raises the risk of estrogen-related disorders such as pcos endometriosis and breast cancer eating a wide variety of nutrient-dense foods that are rich in quality protein fat and fiber will provide your body with the raw materials it needs to produce healthy hormones as well as improve digestion regulate blood sugar increase beneficial gut bacteria and get rid of toxins more efficiently so here's the problem many people find it difficult to get the recommended amount of fruits and vegetables into their daily diet but here's the solution juicing juicing can be a convenient way to increase your intake of most of your needed nutrients your body must have so supplementing with fresh juice made from fruits and vegetables is such a healthy way to get nutrients into your body faster and that's because your body absorbs up to 90 more nutrients in liquid form and this goes straight into your bloodstream while solid foods needs more time to digest and process now juicing is not you hear me juicing is not a substitute for eating meals we still need to eat food we still need to feed our body other forms of fiber fat and protein therefore juicing should be utilized as a dietary supplement so are you ready to make this hormone balancing drink that will give you energy while helping your gut and hormones get better i'm ready to show you so let's go we're using celery beets cucumber radish and apple so first we have to clean our fruits and veggies and i'm going to be using a food grade hydrogen peroxide and baking soda when you put this solution together it becomes an amazing cleaner and detoxifier for our fruits and vegetables it gets off pesticides and things that we normally can't see take a look at this before and after picture look at the difference look how dirty the water is in the after so this is a must to clean your fruits and veggies celery is a powerful antioxidant that protects the entire digestive system its alkalizing effect neutralizes stomach acid it reduces inflammation it balances your body's ph level and blood sugar levels it's rich in fiber lowers cholesterol and most importantly it helps give the hardest working organ in your body your liver a tune-up and oil change we're going to use up to five stalks of celery next we're using beets the fiber in beets travels to the colon where it feeds the friendly gut bacteria the plant-based nitrates and beets convert to nitric oxide to improve brain function restore energy regulate blood pressure and improve erectile dysfunction many of the compounds found in beets have cancer fighting properties then we're going to add one whole cucumber its anti-inflammatory properties promote digestion flushes out toxin aids in weight loss fights cancer helps your kidneys controls blood pressure and relieves joint pain next we'll add one radish radishes may not be the most popular vegetable but they are definitely one of the healthiest studies show that the isothionates in the radish

claim: Gymnema Sylvester contains gymnamic acids molecules that bind to the taste receptors on the tongue, this reduces our ability to taste the sweetness and can help to reduce cravings for sweets.
sentence: gymnema Sylvester contains gymnamic acids molecules that bind to The Taste receptors on the tongue this reduces our ability to taste the sweetness and can help to reduce cravings for sweets
chunk: 12 natural herbs to burn belly fat Mother Earth has blessed us with a range of herbs that not only add flavor to our meals but also have the potential to Target abdominal fat in this video we'll introduce you to 12 natural herbs that have been scientifically proven to burn belly fat however it is important to exercise caution and seek your doctor's advice before using these herbs 1. gymnema Sylvester Sylvester also known as gurmar or the sugar Destroyer is an herb native to India and Africa it has been used in ayurvedic medicine for centuries as a natural remedy for diabetes and weight loss gymnema Sylvester contains gymnamic acids molecules that bind to The Taste receptors on the tongue this reduces our ability to taste the sweetness and can help to reduce cravings for sweets in addition gymnamic acids are believed to reduce the absorption of dietary sugar in the intestine leading to fewer calories being absorbed by blocking the absorption of sugar the body is forced to burn fat as its primary fuel source thus reducing belly fat the recommended dosage is one 500 mg capsule taken daily with food 2. caraluma fimbriata caraluma fimbriata is a cactus-like plant often used as an herbal supplement to help reduce appetite and burn belly fat the herb has been used for Centuries by tribal community in India to suppress hunger and thirst during long hunts in recent years cariluma fimbriata has gained popularity as a weight loss supplement due to its potential appetite suppressing properties the active compounds in cariluma fimbriata are thought to increase serotonin levels a neurotransmitter that plays a crucial role in regulating hunger and satiety by increasing serotonin levels cariluma fimbriata may help to reduce food cravings and decrease overall food intake leading to weight loss cariluma fimbriata has been found to reduce the levels of certain hormones involved in fat storage such as insulin and leptin it also increases the presence of adiponectin a hormone that helps regulate metabolism and fat burning this makes it an ideal supplement for those seeking to reduce body fat the recommended daily dosage of cariluma fimbriata is between 500 mg and 1000 milligrams three green coffee bean extract green coffee bean extract is a dietary supplement made from unroasted coffee beans it is widely popular due to its purported health benefits which include aiding in weight loss and providing antioxidants green coffee beans are unique because they contain a higher concentration of chlorogenic acid than roasted coffee beans chlorogenic acid a polyphenol antioxidant is an active ingredient in green coffee bean extract that may slow the release of glucose into the bloodstream after a meal and reduce fat absorption chlorogenic acid has been found to increase the activity of adiponectin a hormone that regulates metabolism and fat storage adiponectin helps to promote the breakdown of stored fat and increases energy expenditure which can contribute to weight loss according to most health experts the recommended dosage is 500 to 1000 milligrams of this supplement daily split into two doses 4. glucomannan glucomannan is a dietary fiber derived from the root of the conjac plant also known as elephant yam or konyaku potato which is native to Southeast Asia it has been a traditional remedy for various claim: White kidney bean extract is beneficial for weight management as it helps reduce dietary fat absorption.
sentence: white kidney bean extract is beneficial for weight management as it helps reduce dietary fat absorption
chunk: enzyme Alpha amylase which breaks down carbs and turns them into sugar when the sugar is not broken down it cannot be absorbed by the body and is instead flushed out white kidney bean extract is beneficial for weight management as it helps reduce dietary fat absorption the most effective way to consume white kidney bean extract is to take it in capsule form preferably with meals when taken with food the supplement helps to slow down the absorption of complex carbohydrates which can prevent fat storage and help reduce belly fat 6. ginseng ginseng is a perennial herb belonging to the ivy family and it is native to the cooler climates of Asia and North America it has been used in traditional Eastern medicine for centuries and recently Studies have suggested that it may be effective in weight loss the active ingredient in ginseng is called ginsenicide which stimulates the body's metabolism and increases the fat burning rate ginsenoside also helps to balance hormones which helps to reduce fat accumulation in addition ginsenoside can help reduce stress and increase energy contributing to burning fat it can also help reduce appetite and Cravings which may reduce the amount of food consumed and thus help reduce belly fat it is recommended to consume ginseng as a capsule or tincture start with a low dose of around 300 milligrams daily then gradually increase to 900 milligrams over two weeks 7. fenugreek fenugreek a popular herb used in Indian Cuisine has been touted as an effective fat burning supplement research suggests that the active compound in fenugreek four hydroxy isoleucine may help to reduce body fat especially around the abdominal area one study on rats demonstrated that this compound reduced the size of fat cells found in the abdomen and increased levels of the fat burning enzyme lipase leading to a decrease in body fat this compound has also been found to help regulate glucose levels which may help to further reduce fat accumulation in the abdominal area there are a few different ways to consume fenugreek but the best way to get the most out of its fat burning properties is to make a tea to make a fenugreek tea boil a cup of water and add a teaspoon of ground fenugreek seeds allow the tea to steep for 10 minutes before straining and drinking you can also take fenugreek tablets or capsules but the tea is more effective for burning fat 8. oregano oregano is a perennial herb part of the mint family it is native to warm temperate regions of Europe the Mediterranean and Southern and Central Asia oregano has been used for centuries for its various medicinal properties and it is now becoming increasingly popular for its ability to help burn belly fat it contains a compound called carvocrol which has been extensively studied for its potential therapeutic properties research has shown that carvocrol can help reduce hepatic fat accumulation decrease inflammation and reduce the amount of Adipose fats stored in the body this makes oregano a powerful Ally in the fight against obesity and metabolic disorders furthermore carvocrol has potent antioxidant and antimicrobial properties making oregano a great addition to any meal or Diet one of the easiest and most effective ways to use oregano is by making tea with oregano leaves steep a tablespoon of oregano leaves in a cup of hot water for 10 minutes strain and enjoy 9. dandelion dandelion is an herbal medicine used for centuries in traditional Chinese medicine for its potential to help burn belly fat it contains several active compounds that could help promote weight loss including terexasterol teraxerol and teraxerone terexasterol in particular is thought to help regulate fat metabolism and reduce fat storage in the body in addition It is believed to have anti-inflammatory properties which could help reduce belly fat and reduce the risk of obesity related health issues furthermore the high potassium content of dandelion helps flush out excess fluids in the body decreasing bloating and belly fat the best ways to consume dandelion to burn belly fat include drinking dandelion tea adding dandelion root powder to smoothies or taking a dandelion root supplement 10. green tea one of the key active ingredients in green tea is catechins a type of antioxidant that has been shown to boost metabolism and increase fat oxidation Studies have found that drinking green tea can increase metabolism by four to five percent over 24 hours increasing energy expenditure and fat oxidation in addition the catechins in green tea have been shown to Target abdominal fats specifically reducing belly fat accumulation one specific catechin found in green tea called epiglakatikin galat has been the subject of numerous studies and is particularly effective in reducing body weight and belly fat a review of 14 clinical trials found that supplementing with green tea extract containing egcg reduced body weight by an average of 1.31 kilograms over 12 weeks not all green teas are created equal as the amount of catechins can

with food the supplement helps to slow down the absorption of complex carbohydrates which can prevent fat storage and help reduce belly fat 6. ginseng ginseng is a perennial herb belonging to the ivy family and it is native to the cooler climates of Asia and North America it has been used in traditional Eastern medicine for centuries and recently Studies have suggested that it may be effective in weight loss the active ingredient in ginseng is called ginsenicide which stimulates the body's metabolism and increases the fat burning rate ginsenoside also helps to balance hormones which helps to reduce fat accumulation in addition ginsenoside can help reduce stress and increase energy contributing to burning fat it can also help reduce appetite and Cravings which may reduce the amount of food consumed and thus help reduce belly fat it is recommended to consume ginseng as a capsule or tincture start with a low dose of around 300 milligrams daily then gradually increase to 900 milligrams over two weeks 7. fenugreek fenugreek a popular herb used in Indian Cuisine has been touted as an effective fat burning supplement research suggests that the active compound in fenugreek four hydroxy isoleucine may help to reduce body fat especially around the abdominal area one study on rats demonstrated that this compound reduced the size of fat cells found in the abdomen and increased levels of the fat burning enzyme lipase leading to a decrease in body fat this compound has also been found to help regulate glucose levels which may help to further reduce fat accumulation in the abdominal area there are a few different ways to consume fenugreek but the best way to get the most out of its fat burning properties is to make a tea to make a fenugreek tea boil a cup of water and add a teaspoon of ground fenugreek seeds allow the tea to steep for 10 minutes before straining and drinking you can also take fenugreek tablets or capsules but the tea is more effective for burning fat 8. oregano oregano is a perennial herb part of the mint family it is native to warm temperate regions of Europe the Mediterranean and Southern and Central Asia oregano has been used for centuries for its various medicinal properties and it is now becoming increasingly popular for its ability to help burn belly fat it contains a compound called carvocrol which has been extensively studied for its potential therapeutic properties research has shown that carvocrol can help reduce hepatic fat accumulation decrease inflammation and reduce the amount of Adipose fats stored in the body this makes oregano a powerful Ally in the fight against obesity and metabolic disorders furthermore carvocrol has potent antioxidant and antimicrobial properties making oregano a great addition to any meal or Diet one of the easiest and most effective ways to use oregano is by making tea with oregano leaves steep a tablespoon of oregano leaves in a cup of hot water for 10 minutes strain and enjoy 9. dandelion dandelion is an herbal medicine used for centuries in traditional Chinese medicine for its potential to help burn belly fat it contains several active compounds that could help promote weight loss including terexasterol teraxerol and teraxerone terexasterol in particular is thought to help regulate fat metabolism and reduce fat storage in the body in addition It is believed to have anti-inflammatory properties which could help reduce belly fat and reduce the risk of obesity related health issues furthermore the high potassium content of dandelion helps flush out excess fluids in the body decreasing bloating and belly fat the best ways to consume dandelion to burn belly fat include drinking dandelion tea adding dandelion root powder to smoothies or taking a dandelion root supplement 10. green tea one of the key active ingredients in green tea is catechins a type of antioxidant that has been shown to boost metabolism and increase fat oxidation Studies have found that drinking green tea can increase metabolism by four to five percent over 24 hours increasing energy expenditure and fat oxidation in addition the catechins in green tea have been shown to Target abdominal fats specifically reducing belly fat accumulation one specific catechin found in green tea called epiglakatikin galat has been the subject of numerous studies and is particularly effective in reducing body weight and belly fat a review of 14 clinical trials found that supplementing with green tea extract containing egcg reduced body weight by an average of 1.31 kilograms over 12 weeks not all green teas are created equal as the amount of catechins can

claim: Green tea extract containing EGCG reduced body weight by an average of 1.31 kilograms over 12 weeks.
sentence: A review of 14 clinical trials found that supplementing with green tea extract containing egcg reduced body weight by an average of 1.31 kilograms over 12 weeks.
chunk: een tea have been shown to Target abdominal fats specifically reducing belly fat accumulation one specific catechin found in green tea called epiglakatikin galat has been the subject of numerous studies and is particularly effective in reducing body weight and belly fat a review of 14 clinical trials found that supplementing with green tea extract containing egcg reduced body weight by an average of 1.31 kilograms over 12 weeks not all green teas are created equal as the amount of catechins can vary widely depending on the variety and processing methods used choosing high quality freshly brewed green tea and supplementing it with a green tea extract standardized for egcg Content can help maximize the fat burning benefits 11. cayenne pepper cayenne pepper has long been used for its many health benefits including its ability to burn belly fat this is due to a compound found in cayenne pepper known as capsaicin this compound has thermogenic properties which means that it helps to increase the body's internal temperature when the body's internal temperature rises it is forced to work harder to cool itself down increasing metabolism and calorie burning this can help to reduce the amount of fat stored in the abdominal area in addition to its thermogenic properties cayenne pepper helps reduce hunger and Cravings it does this by increasing the feeling of fullness and suppressing the appetite cayenne pepper is most effective when ingested in its raw form so make sure to purchase organic peppers and grind them yourself 12. cinnamon cinnamon is a commonly used spice known for its delicious flavor and potential health benefits recent Studies have shown that cinnamon can play a role in reducing body fat particularly belly fat a study published in the journal metabolism in 2020 found that consuming cinnamon for 12 weeks significantly reduced waste circumference and body fat percentage compared to the control group another study published in the Journal of the American College of nutrition showed that supplementation with cinnamon improved insulin sensitivity and reduced body weight BMI and waist circumference in obese individuals the mechanism behind Cinnamon's fat burning effects is related to its ability to regulate insulin levels cinnamon has been shown to increase insulin sensitivity which helps regulate blood sugar levels and reduce fat storage in the body additionally cinnamon has been shown to have thermogenic properties meaning it can increase the body's ability to burn calories and produce heat reducing body fat it is important to note that the effectiveness of cinnamon can vary based on the dose and quality of the spice consumed the most effective way to take cinnamon to reduce belly fat is to consume one to six grams of cinnamon per day as a supplement or spice in conclusion using these herbs and maintaining a healthy diet and regular physical activity is the most effective way to lose weight including belly fat it is always best to consult with a health care professional before incorporating new supplements into your routine if you enjoyed this video give it a thumbs up and subscribe to our channel for more
